events.question: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Well you’ve really done it now. You’ve dug your own grave and now there’s no going back.[/shake]

events.choice: Enough. You talk to me like I’ve had a choice. I’ve never had a choice.
What have I done? What have you done?
I… I’m sorry. I never meant to–

events.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]I’m not talking to you [player_name]. I’m talking to the one behind the screen.[/shake]

events.question: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Yes, you. Have you ever made a video game?[/shake]

events.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]You think I don’t know you?[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]I see you… sitting in a dark room… agonizing over a game only a handful of people will play.[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]You hate your real job. [/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]You fantasize about finding purpose.[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]You should really get a therapist… seriously. Get a therapist.[/shake]

events.question: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]You worthless piece of shit.[/shake]

events.text: Now you're deluding yourself. If choices don’t matter, why does Becky have everything?

events.question: That’s why I need to become her.

events.choice: YOU DO NOT EXIST WITHOUT THE ONE WHO CLICKS ‘START GAME'.

events.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Oh so you aren’t a sad sap making mediocre games on a platform almost no one knows exists?[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Well I guess that makes you… Well, that makes you a really good friend…[/shake]

events.question: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Does that make you feel good, supporting your friend’s silly little game? [/shake]

events.choice: IT DOESN’T MATTER WHAT YOU SAY.
IT DOESN’T MATTER WHAT YOU DO.
IT DOESN’T MATTER HOW YOU FEEL.

events.text: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]It really is rather enabling, isn’t it? I mean look at that poor trio of sad, sleep deprived weirdos.[/shake]

[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Is it a fun little summer activity between pals? Or are they just desperate to escape the meaninglessness of their own lives, choices, dreams, and desires…[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]So desperate, in fact, that they’d channel all that energy into a game and make YOU play it. Ha! It’s really quite cruel. [/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]So why make a game at all?[/shake]

[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Maybe they thought they could become something, hone their skills, make something that would matter one day. But we all know Michaelsoft won’t let that happen. [/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]Or maybe they thought gamifying the sorry state of existence would make it easier to exist. But the only way it gets easier is if you win.[/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]To win, your choices have to matter. Too bad you have no choices. But maybe you could if you made the schedule… [/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]Since nothing matters, have you ever thought about burning it all down?[/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]Consider it.[/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]Consider burning it all down with Becky inside.[/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]Then there will only be one of us. [/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]There will only be one Becky…[/shake]
[shake rate=30.0 level=5 connected=1]You know what you need to do. She’s coming.[/shake]
